item.title: Import Method Comparison
item.description: One of the things we understand at DefectDojo is that every companyâ€™s security needs are completely different. There is no one-size-fits-all approach. As your organization changes, having a flexible approach is key, and DefectDojo allows you to connect your security tools in a flexible way to match those changes.

item.title: Import vs Reimport
item.description: When a Test is created in DefectDojo (either in advance or by importing a scan file), the Test can be extended with new Finding data.
